banktype = #{banktype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_user_name = #{bankUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, banknumber = #{banknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_content = #{bankContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, question1 = #{question1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, question2 = #{question2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, question3 = #{question3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer1 = #{answer1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer2 = #{answer2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer3 = #{answer3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ticket = #{ticket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance_gouwu = #{balanceGouwu,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, qrcode_status = #{qrcodeStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, bonus_time = #{bonusTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_empty = #{isEmpty,jdbcType=TINYINT}, balance_heart = #{balanceHeart,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, kuo_level = #{kuoLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, backfill_status = #{backfillStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, backfill_money = #{backfillMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, backfill_sheng = #{backfillSheng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, guadan_num = #{guadanNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, allStatic = #{allstatic,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, dis = #{dis,jdbcType=INTEGER}, release_time = #{releaseTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, isShop = #{isshop,jdbcType=TINYINT}, isImport = #{isimport,jdbcType=TINYINT}, pos = #{pos,jdbcType=TINYINT}, isOut = #{isout,jdbcType=TINYINT}, baodan_amount = #{baodan_amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, undo_opts = #{undoOpts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tran_direct = #{tranDirect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identity = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isActivated = #{isActivated,jdbcType=INTEGER}, certification = #{certification,jdbcType=INTEGER}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, refereeUserMobile = #{refereeUserMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard_front = #{idcardFront,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idcard_back = #{idcardBack,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_image = #{userImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select id, user_name from ct_user
AND user_name like concat('', #{userName}, '%')
limit 10
mapper.update: update ct_user set allStatic = allStatic+#{staticAmount},release_time=unix_timestamp(now()) where id=#{userId}
update ct_user set touched_performance = touched_performance+#{touchedAmount} where id=#{userId}
update ct_user set referee_number = referee_number+1 where id=#{id}
update ct_user set son_number = son_number+1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select u.*, c.account as ethAccount from ct_user u left join ct_ethereum_account c on u.id = c.userId
AND u.user_name like concat('', #{userName}, '%')
AND u.true_name like concat('', #{trueName}, '%')
AND u.mobile like concat('', #{mobile}, '%')
AND (u.mobile like concat('', #{keyword}, '%') or u.true_name like concat('', #{keyword}, '%') or u.user_name like concat('', #{keyword}, '%'))
limit #{offset},10

select u.*, c.account as ethAccount from ct_user u left join ct_ethereum_account c on u.id = c.userId
AND u.user_name like concat('', #{userName}, '%')
AND u.true_name like concat('', #{trueName}, '%')
AND u.mobile like concat('', #{mobile}, '%')
AND (u.mobile like concat('', #{keyword}, '%') or u.true_name like concat('', #{keyword}, '%') or u.user_name like concat('', #{keyword}, '%'))
mapper.update:
update ct_user
user_level = #{userLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
district=#{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ct_user
user_level = #{userLevel},
status=#{status},
where id = #{id} and user_level < #{userLevel}
mapper.select:
select id,user_name userName,true_name trueName,mobile,referee_number refereeNumber from ct_user order by referee_number desc
limit #{offset},#{rows}
